projects.name: TroveMusic
projects.desc: TroveMusic is a Full-stack music sharing platform created by my SAIT Capstone group and I. Trove features a fully responsive & attractive design. I personally worked on the client interface.
projects.desc2: Trove was a huge project, it was supposed to be a fully featured music app: meaning it had Artist and Admin sites as well, it was rocky and unpolished but everything worked in the end.
projects.anec: In retrospect - Trove was more ambitious than our combined skills would allow - Trove was a good learning experience on how scope creep can really be dangerous when dealing with a deadline.
